notes: WiKNN is an online text classifier service for Polish and English texts. It supports hierarchical labelled classification of user-submitted texts with Wikipedia categories. WiKNN is available through a web-based interface (http://pelcra.clarin-pl.eu/tools/classifier/) and as a  REST service with interactive documentation available at http://clarin.pelcra.pl/apidocs/wiknn.
title: WiKNN Text Classifier
